verses.text: \w A|strong="H1121"\w* prayer \w for|strong="H1121"\w* David himself. Incline thy ear, O Lord, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hear \w me|strong="H1121"\w*: \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* am needy \w and|strong="H1121"\w* poor.

Preserve \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* holy: save thy servant, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee.

\w Have|strong="H5771"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, O Lord, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* cried \w to|strong="H5771"\w* thee \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day.

\w Give|strong="H7725"\w* joy \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w of|strong="H3605"\w* thy servant, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee, O Lord, \w I|strong="H5678"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord, art sweet \w and|strong="H0430"\w* mild: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* plenteous \w in|strong="H0430"\w* mercy \w to|strong="H7725"\w* all \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w call|strong="H7725"\w* upon thee.

Give ear, O Lord, \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w my|strong="H4900"\w* prayer: \w and|strong="H0639"\w* attend \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H0639"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0639"\w* \w my|strong="H4900"\w* petition.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* called upon thee \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* day \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* trouble: because thou hast heard \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* none among \w the|strong="H7200"\w* gods \w like|strong="H3068"\w* unto thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* none according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thy works.

All \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* adore \w before|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* glorify thy name.
\w For|strong="H0776"\w* thou art great \w and|strong="H0776"\w* dost wonderful things: thou art God \w alone|strong="H0389"\w*.

Conduct me, O \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w in|strong="H7965"\w* thy way, \w and|strong="H0571"\w* \w I|strong="H7965"\w* \w will|strong="H6664"\w* walk \w in|strong="H7965"\w* thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: let my heart rejoice that \w it|strong="H7965"\w* \w may|strong="H7965"\w* fear thy name.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* praise thee, O Lord my \w God|strong="H8064"\w*: \w with|strong="H0776"\w* my whole heart, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* glorify thy name \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ever:

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H2896"\w* towards \w me|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* soul out \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* lower hell.

O God, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked \w are|strong="H1870"\w* risen \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mighty \w have|strong="H1980"\w* \w sought|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* soul: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* eyes.
And thou, O Lord, art a God of compassion, and merciful, patient, and of much mercy, and true.
O look upon me, and have mercy on me: give thy command to thy servant, and save the son of thy handmaid.
Shew me a token for good: that they who hate me may see, and be confounded, because thou, O Lord, hast helped me and hast comforted me.
